original_title: Denis Matsuev plays Schumann and Rachmaninov
overview: On the stage of the Salle des Combins in Verbier, Denis Matsuev, nicknamed the "Siberian Bear", astonished his audience with a programme dedicated to Schumann and Rachmaninov. Greatly acclaimed for his interpretations, Matsuev concluded this recital with an incredible series of encores by Rossini, Tchaikovsky, Duke Ellington or Shchedri.
title: Denis Matsuev plays Schumann and Rachmaninov
